title: Math is the hidden secret to understanding the world - Roger Antonsen

multiple-choice.question: What is the speaker's claim about the nature of understanding?

options.text: Understanding is the ability to change your perspective.

options.label: C
options.text: Understanding is the ability to recognize patterns.

options.label: D
options.text: Understanding is the ability to solve equations.

options.label: C
options.text: The pattern of notes in a musical scale.

options.label: D

options.label: C
options.text: It is a definition of a mathematical operation.

options.label: D

options.label: C

options.label: B

options.label: D

options.label: A
options.text: To focus on memorizing mathematical formulas.

options.label: C
